Interface Refreshable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HomeBasePanel, HospitalPanel, PowerUpDenPanel, ShopPanel, VillainsLairPanel

    public interface Refreshable
    Panels which contain dynamic components should implement the Refreshable interface. This enforces implementation of a refresh() method which is required to update dynamic components. The refresh() method should be called each time the panel shown by the main CardLayout in the Game window is changed to ensure that the panel is updated before it is shown to the user.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void refresh​()
      Called each time the panel shown by the main CardLayout in the Game window is changed to ensure that the panel is updated before it is shown to the user.

      • refresh
